top_stories.title: NIH launches landmark project on whole-person health and function
top_stories.description: Approach involves looking at the whole person—not just separate organs or body systems—and considering multiple factors that promote health.
top_stories.content: Approach involves looking at the whole person—not just separate organs or body systems—and considering multiple factors that promote health.

top_stories.title: Microsoft, NVIDIA and Anthropic Announce Strategic Partnerships
top_stories.description: Today, Microsoft, NVIDIA and Anthropic announced new strategic partnerships. Anthropic is scaling its rapidly growing Claude AI model on Microsoft Azure, powered by NVIDIA, which will broaden access to Claude and provide Azure enterprise customers with expanded model choice and new capabilities. Anthropic has committed to purchase $30 billion of Azure compute capacity and to Read Article

top_stories.title: Powering AI Superfactories, NVIDIA and Microsoft Integrate Latest Technologies for Inference, Cybersecurity, Physical AI
top_stories.description: Timed with the Microsoft Ignite conference running this week, NVIDIA is expanding its collaboration with Microsoft, including through the adoption of next-generation NVIDIA Spectrum-X Ethernet switches for the new Microsoft Fairwater AI superfactory, powered by the NVIDIA Blackwell platform. The collaboration brings new integrations across Microsoft 365 Copilot, as well as the public preview of Read Article
top_stories.author: Ian Buck
top_stories.content: Timed with the Microsoft Ignite conference running this week, NVIDIA is expanding its collaboration with Microsoft, including through the adoption of next-generation NVIDIA Spectrum-X Ethernet switches for the new Microsoft Fairwater AI superfactory, powered by the NVIDIA Blackwell platform. The collaboration brings new integrations across Microsoft 365 Copilot, as well as the public preview of Read Article

top_stories.title: Accelerated Computing, Networking Drive Supercomputing in Age of AI
top_stories.description: At SC25, NVIDIA unveiled advances across NVIDIA BlueField DPUs, next-generation networking, quantum computing, national research, AI physics and more — as accelerated systems drive the next chapter in AI supercomputing. NVIDIA also highlighted storage innovations powered by the NVIDIA BlueField-4 data processing unit, part of the full-stack BlueField platform that accelerates gigascale AI infrastructure. More Read Article
top_stories.author: Scott Martin
